CustomField.description: Indicates if an email address is valid (this field is updated by the Email Invalid status which is triggered by a Smart Campaign in Marketo). A red error icon will be displayed in the Email Status if the email address has bounced three times in the past three months. Agents will be asked to reconfirm the customer's email address on the next call when they see an invalid email address in the contact details.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please reconfirm the customer's email address during the next call if a red error icon (which indicates email address is invalid) appears in Email Status.
CustomField.label: Email Status
